content.description: The x axis ranges from negative 5 to 4 in increments of 1. The y axis is labeled p of x and shows no scale or tick marks. Moving from left to right:
content.question: The curve begins at the top of the second quadrant at a point with an x value of negative 4. The curve decreases sharply to touch the x axis at (negative 3 comma 0), at which it reaches a low point. The curve increases to reach a high point at a point with an x value of approximately negative 0.5 and a y value less than the y value at which the curve began. The curve then decreases to cross the y axis and touch the x axis at (2 comma 0), at which it reaches a low point. The curve then increases sharply to end at the top of the first quadrant at a point with an x value of 3 and a y value equal to that of the beginning point. The curve appears to be symmetric about the vertical line through x equals negative 0.5. ​The graph of a polynomial function <math alttext="y equals p open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> is shown. Which of the following expressions could define <math alttext="p open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="open parentheses x minus 3 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses x plus 3 close parentheses open parentheses x minus 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
